title: Prepare for Sound Mixing Session
description: A sound mixer needs the final audio tracks for a scene to begin the mixing process.

tasks.description: Retrieve all separated audio tracks (dialogue, effects, music) for the specified scene.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the individual audio stems.

tasks.description: Package the audio tracks into a standardized format (e.g., AAF) for the mixing software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully exports an AAF file.

tasks.description: Deliver the AAF package to the sound mixer.
